alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:20PM EDT until September 07 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Laurens County in central Georgia... Southern Wilkinson County in central Georgia... Northeastern Twiggs County in central Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 320 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Myricks Mill, or near Jeffersonville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Myricks Mill, and Nicklesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
